name: Ch17ABaseConvo4
_source: speak;Ross;The Narube River!|It's so vast!|The water's so clear you can see straight to the bottom!
speak;Tana;It's beautiful, isn't it?|The local villagers really depend on this river for their livelihood.
speak;Ross;Yeah, they do.|My father used to fish here when I was younger.|He would bring home the biggest catches!
speak;Tana;I can imagine!|The fish here are known to be quite plentiful.
speak;Ross;That's why I'm here!|I want to see if I can catch some myself!|Maybe even bigger than what my father caught!
speak;Tana;Ha ha! That's quite the ambition, Ross!|I'm sure you'll manage somehow.
speak;Ross;You bet I will!|Maybe I can even catch enough to share with everyone in camp!
speak;Tana;That would be wonderful.|Fresh fish would be a nice change from our usual rations.
speak;Tana;You know, Syrene should be stationed near here.|I wonder if she's patrolling this area...
speak;Ross;Syrene?|Isn't she one of the Pegasus Knights of Frelia?
speak;Tana;Yes, she is.|And she's also my dear friend.
speak;Tana;I haven't seen her in such a long time...|I hope she's doing alright.
speak;Ross;I'm sure she's fine!|She's a strong knight, isn't she?|Just like you!
speak;Tana;Thank you, Ross.|That's very kind of you to say.
speak;Ross;It's the truth!|Hey, maybe we can look for her after I catch some fish?
speak;Tana;That would be lovely.|I'd appreciate the company.
speak;Ross;Great!|It's decided then!|First fishing, then finding your friend!
speak;Tana;Perfect plan!|Just be careful not to fall in - the current can be strong here.
speak;Ross;Ha!|Don't worry about me!|The son of Garcia knows how to handle himself near water!
speak;Tana;I'm sure you do!|Come on then, let's find a good fishing spot.
speak;Tana;Ross, wait!|The fishing spots are the other way!
